climbs.name: Right Chicken Foot Crack
climbs.fa: Scott Cole, Don Reid, Grant Hiskes August 1977

content.description: Straight in crack up the left center of the same granite pedestal the Left Chicken Foot Crack is on.
content.location: On a 35-foot pedestal about a 1/4 mile west of "Mister Catastrophe". To get off, down climb the easy 5th class chimney on the east edge of the pedestal.

content.description: 5.10a off-width continuation of the Left Chicken Foot Crack. Climb the Left Chicken Foot Crack then continue up an OW to a ledge about 110 ft up.
content.protection: Regular rack including some large cams. No anchors on top. Rap from tied off chock-stones.
content.location: On a small granite pedestal about a 1/4 mile west of "Mr Catastrophe".

climbs.name: Left Chicken Foot Crack
climbs.fa: Scott Cole, Don Reid, Grant Hiskes Summer 1977

content.description: Short 5.10d flared hand crack leading up to a ledge about 35 feet off the ground. Crux is after a hook where the crack goes straight up.
content.location: On the left side of the granite pedestal about a 1/4 mile west of "Mister Catastrophe". To get back down, down climb the easy 5th class chimney on the east edge of the pedestal.
